outputs.output_descr:
The proposed project is to scale up the integration of community based adaptation into district and commune investment programmes. To achieve this objective, the project will be used to achieve the following 2 outputs: 
1.	Increased the support and ownership of sub-national administrations on the integration of climate change into district and commune investment programmes through the engagement and facilitation of key sectors and CSOs; and
2.	Enhanced ownership and readiness of National Committee for Sub-National Democratic Development Secretariat (NCDD-S) for the development and implementation of a climate change mainstreaming operational guideline into sub-national planning process.

project_descr: The proposed project is to scale up the integration of community based adaptation into district and commune investment programmes.
project_title: Scaling up climate change into sub-national planning
